Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
MateZ Lab Limited, is an Art-Tech Lab that helps space to become interesting with advance TECHNOLOGY and ART application. A space is an area, volume, extension of a mindset that represents a vision. Through the unique advantages of technology and art, the space will be expressed in innovative forms, increase social interactive participation, establish online connections, and expand the scope of story expression, and bring deeper story meaning.

 

M.A.T.E.Z. stands for Multimedia, Art, Technology and Experience respectively; our vision is to provide the best experience to every story through technology + art. The last letter "Z" is the shape of the crack on the road stone, which also represents the unconstrained attitude of the new generation of "Z".
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
1.Mainly video data related to multimedia, art, and technology, produced using AI.
2.Operations data related to company system maintenance, which may be in text or file formats.
3.AI test data and code/programming-related data.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
1.Use Kettle to clean and categorize the data, and partition the data on the server.
2.After classification, compress the data using compression software.
3.Transfer the data online to the partner SP via the HTTP protocol.
4.The SP processes the data by splitting and organizing it.
5.Data storage - boost.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America
